contentList.content: Attacks with your pact weapon deal [1].
You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> to maintain <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">Concentration</LSTag> on a spell.
When you hit a creature with <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast">Eldritch Blast</LSTag>, you can pull the creature up to [1] towards you.
When you hit a creature with <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast">Eldritch Blast</LSTag> it reduces the target's <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> by [1].
Your weapon deals an additional [1] and knocks your target <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Target must be Huge or smaller to be knocked <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">prone</LSTag>.
You can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Smite_Eldritch">Eldritch Smite</LSTag> once per turn.
This reaction only triggers on a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.

Your attacks are suffused with eldritch might.

Melee weapon attacks deal an additional [1].
Replenish half of your expended <LSTag Tooltip="WarlockSpellSlot">Warlock Spell Slots</LSTag> (rounded up) while out of combat.
While wielding a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PACT_BLADE">Pact Weapon</LSTag>, you gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> with Medium and Heavy Armour.
You can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Hex_Enduring">Hex</LSTag> once per <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag> without expending a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>.
